item.title: 美国工业生产因罢工和飓风影响而下降
item.description: 由于波音公司机械师罢工和两次飓风的影响，美国 10 月份的工业生产连续第二个月出现下降。【原文：US industrial production declined in October as the impacts from a Boeing Co. machinists’ strike and a pair of hurricanes reverberated through manufacturing for a second month.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨与俄罗斯普京电话讨论乌克兰问题
item.description: 据一位不愿透露姓名的知情人士称，德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨周五与俄罗斯总统普京通了电话，讨论了如何结束乌克兰战争。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin by phone on Friday and discussed how to end the war in Ukraine, according to a person familiar with the matter who spoke on the condition of anonymity.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比表示："利率将在 12-18 个月内大幅下降
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行的奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，只要通胀率继续朝着央行 2% 的目标下降，未来 12-18 个月的利率就会 "大幅 "下降。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago Austan Goolsbee said as long as inflation continues down toward the central bank’s 2% goal, interest rates will be “a lot” lower over the next 12-18 months.】

item.title: 德鲁肯米勒引领家族基金加大美国银行股票押注
item.description: 斯坦利-德鲁肯米勒（Stanley Druckenmiller）的家族办公室引领全球富豪投资公司在上一季度增加了对美国银行股的配置，使他们有望从金融股的反弹中获利。【原文：Stanley Druckenmiller’s family office led investment firms for the world’s rich in boosting allocations to US bank shares last quarter, putting them in line to profit from a rally in financial stocks.】

item.title: 意大利银行行长警告：不要把全球化当作替罪羊
item.description: 意大利银行行长法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）警告说，不要把全球化当作替罪羊，并表示关税不会解决世界的经济挑战。【原文：Bank of Italy Governor Fabio Panetta warned against scapegoating globalization and said tariffs won’t solve the world’s economic challenges.】

item.title: 特朗普胜选提振企业对将 PE 纳入 401(k) 计划的乐观情绪
item.description: 美国最大的私募股权公司预计，当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的胜选将有助于他们从 401（k）等固定缴费计划中获取 11 万亿美元资金。【原文：The biggest US private equity firms anticipate that President-elect Donald Trump’s victory could aid their ambitions to capture some of the $11 trillion sitting in defined-contribution plans such as 401(k)s.】

item.title: 瑞典袖手旁观，Northvolt 为生存而战
item.description: 瑞典政府坚称没有计划拯救濒临破产的电池制造商 Northvolt AB，而是将希望寄托在由股东出资的一揽子拯救计划上。【原文：The Swedish government maintained that it has no plans to rescue ailing battery-cell maker Northvolt AB, instead pinning its hopes on a rescue package funded by shareholders.】

item.title: 美国假日季伊始汽车零售销售增长
item.description: 受汽车购买量跃升的推动，美国 10 月份零售销售额有所增长，而其他类别的销售额也显示出进入假期旺季的一些势头。【原文：US retail sales advanced in October, boosted by a jump in autos purchases, while other categories signaled some momentum entering heading into the holiday season.】

item.title: 波兰承诺削减繁文缛节，吸引企业从卢森堡回国上市
item.description: 波兰金融监管机构正努力加快对计划首次公开发行股票的公司的审批，以帮助吸引发行商回国上市。【原文：Poland’s financial regulator is seeking to speed up approvals for companies planning initial public offerings to help lure back issuers to the country.】

item.title: 今年接近 1 万亿美元的 ETF 热潮打破华尔街记录
item.description: 对于交易所交易基金来说，今年已经是具有里程碑意义的一年，但截至上周五，交易所交易基金领域又增添了一项超级殊荣：创下年度资金流入之最。【原文：This year was already a landmark one for exchange-traded funds, but as of Friday the ETF universe can add another superlative: biggest annual inflows on record.】

item.title: 欧盟深入开采天然气储备，德国警告天然气补给风险
item.description: 欧洲天然气储存的消耗速度快于预期，随着夏季燃料价格的上涨，最大的消费国德国已警告下一个供暖季的再充气风险。【原文：Europe is dipping into its gas storage faster than expected, and with the fuel turning pricier for summer, top consumer Germany has warned of refilling risks for the next heating season.】

item.title: 人工智能如何打破职业阶梯
item.description:
白领学徒制的基本逻辑— 以苦力工作换取在职学习— 突然间岌岌可危。【原文：

The basic logic of white-collar apprenticeship — grunt work for on-the-job learning — is suddenly at risk.

】

item.title: 芬克推动贝莱德高风险押注私募市场
item.description: 拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）通过大宗交易让贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.现在，他也在做同样的事情，以确保他的公司不会在私人资产大潮中落伍。【原文：Larry Fink turned to big deals to get BlackRock Inc. out in front of a decade of money gushing into index funds. Now he’s doing the same to make sure his firm isn’t left behind in the stampede into private assets.】

item.title: 介绍喙资本主义，奇趣团队谈鸡
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 来自利马亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会的最新消息
韩国加密货币狂热和 "泡菜溢价 "的全貌
item.description: 在世界上大多数国家，加密货币交易仍然是一种小众追求，仅限于那些风险承受能力最高的投资者。在韩国，加密货币交易风靡一时，而且已经持续了多年。事实上，现在韩国加密货币交易所的比特币和其他虚拟货币交易活动比国家基准股指 Kospi 上的公司交易活动还要多。【原文：In most of the world, crypto trading remains a niche pursuit, limited to those investors with the highest tolerance for risk. In South Korea, it’s all the rage, and has been for years. In fact, there’s now more trading activity in Bitcoin and other virtual currencies on Korean crypto exchanges than there is in the companies on the national benchmark Kospi share index.】

item.title: 中国 "欧洲制造 "电动汽车利用本地供应商规避关税
item.description: 奇瑞汽车股份有限公司的西班牙合作伙伴表示，该公司正在努力为其与中国汽车制造商的合资企业确保本地制造的零部件，以便其汽车能够以欧洲品牌销售。【原文：Chery Automobile Co.’s Spanish partner said it is working to secure locally made components for its joint venture with the Chinese automaker, so their vehicles can be marketed as European.】

item.title: 超级微型公司在纳斯达克上市的最后期限临近，引发分销担忧
item.description: 超级微型计算机公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.现在离最后期限只有几天了，但该计划仍未实现。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. investors have spent two months waiting for the company to file a plan that would allow it to remain listed on the Nasdaq exchange. With the deadline now just days away, that plan is yet to materialize.】

item.title: 委员会表示，挪威可以等待中央银行数字货币的出现
item.description: 一个为挪威政界人士提供建议的专家委员会表示，即使在现金使用量减少的情况下，他们也不会急于采用由中央银行发行的数字货币，这与邻国瑞典的同行们如出一辙。【原文：An expert committee advising Norwegian politicians signaled there’s no rush to adopt a digital currency issued by the central bank, echoing their colleagues in neighboring Sweden even as cash use dwindles.】

item.title: 科技与力量在人工智能的热潮中碰撞出银河系
item.description:
这两个行业的运行速度大相径庭，因此开始面临压力。【原文：

The two industries operate at wildly different speeds and are starting to face strains as a result.

】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润增长 193%，实现倒闭后的复苏
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司 6 月份的利润增长了近 193%，扭转了长达一年的下滑趋势，因为这家金融科技公司从政府打压中重新站稳了脚跟。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s profit nearly grew 193% in the June quarter, reversing a year-long decline as the fintech company regained its footing from a government crackdown.】

item.title: 中国从 12 月起停止铝和铜的出口退税
item.description: 由于全球贸易伙伴对产能过剩的担忧日益加剧，中国将终止铝和铜的出口退税政策，同时降低部分成品油和电池产品的出口退税。【原文：China is ending its export tax rebate policy for aluminum and copper, while lowering it for some refined oil and battery products as overcapacity concerns have grown among global trading partners.】

item.title: DoorDash 想让您在吃晚饭时搭车看电视节目
item.description: 随着越来越多的美国消费者开始使用共享汽车和外卖应用程序，这些流行服务背后的公司认为，如果它们能相互合作，就能赢得你的忠诚度，并获得更大的发展。但首先...【原文：With rideshare and delivery apps becoming commonplace for more US consumers, the companies behind these popular services think they can win your loyalty and grow even bigger if they work with one another. But first...】

item.title: 全球 80 万亿美元的饮食问题因缺乏健康选择而变得更加严重
item.description: 不良饮食是全球面临的一个根深蒂固的健康挑战，每年造成约 8 万亿美元的隐性成本。【原文：Poor diets are an entrenched health challenge facing the world, driving some $8 trillion in hidden costs each year.】

item.title: 从安第斯山脉到亚马逊河，中国在秘鲁港口的 13 亿美元赌注面临重重困难
item.description: 中国豪赌 13 亿美元，希望秘鲁的一个新港口能够促进南美农业的发展。兑现投资可能比预期的要难。【原文：China has made a $1.3 billion bet that a new port in Peru will boost access to South America’s agricultural bounty. Cashing in on the investment may be harder than expected.】

item.title: Citadel 证券公司通胀主管称美联储无需担心关税问题
item.description: Citadel Securities 的 Durham Abric 表示，美联储的加息路径可能不会因即将上任的特朗普政府的保护主义姿态而中断。【原文：Citadel Securities’ Durham Abric says the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate path probably will be uninterrupted by the incoming Trump administration’s protectionist posture.】

item.title: 穆迪称印度处于 "甜蜜点"，预测 2024 年增长 7.2
item.description: 穆迪评级公司预测，随着家庭消费的缓慢回升和通货膨胀的缓和，2024 年印度经济将增长 7.2%。【原文：Moody’s Ratings forecast a 7.2% growth for the Indian economy in 2024, as household consumption slowly rebounds and inflation moderates.】

item.title: 据说能多洁将考虑以 5 亿欧元出售法国工作服部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Rentokil Initial Plc 正在探索出售其法国工作服业务，因为这家害虫控制公司正在寻求精简业务。【原文：Rentokil Initial Plc is exploring a sale of its French workwear business as the pest control company seeks to streamline its operations, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 电动汽车充电器制造商 Kempower 首席执行官认为 2025 年中期销售将复苏
item.description: Kempower Oyj公司的首席执行官恳求投资者再耐心等待六个月，因为在过去一年里，这家芬兰充电器制造商的市值暴跌了80%以上，仅略高于5亿欧元（约合5.3亿美元）。【原文：Kempower Oyj’s chief executive officer is pleading for six more months of patience from investors who have witnessed a plunge of more than 80% in the Finnish charger maker’s market value over the past year to just over €500 million ($530 million).】
